pageTitle: DYNEX CAPITAL INC (DX:New York): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4808=Dynex Capital, Inc., a mortgage real estate investment trust, invests in mortgage securities on a leveraged basis in the United States. It invests in residential mortgage-backed securities and commercial mortgage-backed securities (CMBS), including CMBS interest-only securities guaranteed by an agency of the U.S. government or a U.S. government-sponsored entity; non-agency mortgage-backed securities; and securitized and unsecuritized mortgage loans. The company has qualified as a real estate investment trust for federal income tax purposes. It generally would not be subject to federal corporate income taxes if it distributes at least 90% of its taxable income to its stockholders. Dynex Capital, Inc. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Glen Allen, Virginia., 10554=Dynex Capital Inc. Presents at Deutsche Bank Mortgage REIT One-on-One Day, Jun-24-2015 . Venue: Grand Hyatt New York, 109 East 42nd Street (at Grand Central Terminal), New York, NY, United States., 11191=Dynex Capital Inc. announced that the company’s board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.24 per common share for the second quarter of 2015 payable on July 31, 2015 to shareholders of record on July 6, 2015. The company also announced that it will pay the regular quarterly dividend of $0.53125 per share on its 8.50% Series A Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock and $0.4765625 per share on its 7.625% Series B Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock for the second quarter of 2015. Both dividends will be paid on July 15, 2015 to shareholders of record of the Series A and Series B Preferred Stocks as of July 1, 2015., 12219=Dynex Capital Inc. Presents at Keefe, Bruyette, & Woods Mortgage Finance Conference, Jun-02-2015 04:10 PM. Venue: Millennium Broadway Hotel, 145 West 44th Street, New York, New York, United States. Speakers: Byron L. Boston, Chief Executive Officer, President, Co-Chief Investment Officer and Director.}
